text: Meyer Harris "Mickey" Cohen (September 4, 1913 â€“ July 29, 1976) was an American gangster who worked in Los Angeles. He was part of the Jewish Mafia, and also had strong ties to the American Mafia from the 1930s through 1960s. ==Other websites== *Benny's Shadow: All about Mickey Cohen by Mark Gribben *Recollections of Mickey Cohen on the Los Angeles Times' Daily Mirror blog *Biography of Mickey Cohen - Biography.com *Time, April 15, 1957 * * Beyond 'Gangster Squad': The Real Mickey Cohen, by Tere Tereba Category:1913 births Category:1976 deaths Category:Deaths from stomach cancer Category:American gangsters Category:Businesspeople from New York City
title: Mickey Cohen
